decisions.context: Migration from legacy cluster to new FTCP cluster completed, with legacy still available as fallback until early next week

decisions.what: Direct calls to BCS & MAS will be rejected, only calls through mss-cart-service allowed

Creating monorepo for all BFFs under New Ventures Engineering (NVE)

decisions.what: Skip failing E2E tests due to staging rollout impact
decisions.context: Tests failing due to brand rollout on staging, blocking multiple PRs

blockers.description: E2E test petFoodCheckoutInfo.spec.ts failing due to staging rollout
blockers.impact: Blocking multiple PRs from merging (PR #59271 and others)

blockers.description: Excessive Honeycomb span collection (100+ spans per session)

action_items.task: Remove NMPS app from legacy cluster for live environment
Fix tpt-selected-meals-bug-tracing excessive firing on re-render
Create public channel for new-ventures-bff repo
action_items.due: Once repo is ready for contribution

action_items.task: Skip failing E2E tests in petFoodCheckoutInfo.spec.ts
Review and merge PR #58127 (host change to mss-cart-service)

key_context.summary: NMPS successfully migrated to new FTCP cluster with gradual rollout (10% → 50% → 100%), legacy cluster maintained as fallback until early next week.
key_context.relevance: Major infrastructure change affecting SKU retrieval service stability

key_context.summary: Team migrating from direct BCS/MAS calls to mss-cart-service API, requiring script updates and endpoint changes.
key_context.relevance: Architectural shift affecting multiple tools and workflows

key_context.summary: tpt-selected-meals-bug-tracing span firing excessively (100+ times) due to non-memoized chosenCourses array causing re-renders.
key_context.relevance: Impacts observability data quality and potential application performance

key_context.summary: First orders on staging showing unexpected quick actions enabled due to new feature testing, but trial box functionality confirmed working correctly.
key_context.relevance: Expected behavior change for testing purposes, no production impact

key_context.summary: Pet food checkout E2E tests failing due to brand rollout on staging, blocking multiple PRs until tests were skipped.
key_context.relevance: Immediate blocker for development workflow requiring quick resolution

key_context.summary: Starting new monorepo 'new-ventures-bff' to host all BFF services for the New Ventures Engineering team.
key_context.relevance: New architectural pattern for backend-for-frontend services

summary: Squad discussed NMPS migration to FTCP (now at 100% traffic), API consolidation through mss-cart-service, resolved E2E test blockers from staging rollout, identified and ticketed Honeycomb tracing performance issue, and initiated new-ventures-bff monorepo project.
